original_title: 7 arrested with weapons and ammunition in Rajagiriya
original_body_lines: The officers of Police Narcotics Bureau (PNB) have arrested seven individuals along with a T-56 weapon, a micro pistol and a cache of live ammunition in Rajagiriya.
Meanwhile, police have also taken into custody 300 rounds of live T-56 ammunition and 50 rounds of 9mm ammunition which were found in their possession.
